TOMATO JUICE

Our Website

Ingredients

  • 15 large tomatoes
  • 4 stalks celery cut
  • 1/2 large onion cut
  • 1 tsp salt

Steps

  1. Place all ingredients in a pot.
  2. Cook for 45 minutes on medium high heat as your stir from time to time.
  3. Let it cool to room temperature.
  4. Strain the juice.
  5. Refrigerate for 4-5 days.

Your homemade tomato juice is ready to be served! ^^

For a clearer picture, you can go and visit the original creator! ^^
